title: Review: Miss Grape Road adds lighter, compact bikepacking bags for faster rides
content:
Earlier this summer, Italian bag maker Miss Grape has added several all-new smaller, lighter Road collection packs to their bikepacking bag lineup. Built for “Far AND Fast” rides both on and off-road, we’ve been riding the new Cluster 7, Internode 2 & Node Road on weekend adventures and sub 24hour overnighters where we could pare […]

The post Review: Miss Grape Road adds lighter, compact bikepacking bags for faster rides appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
